name: Animal Hunter
description:
Objective:

Hunt down floating animals heads within the given time.

Controls:

Killing floating animal head: Mouse (LMB)

Tools used:

Game engine
Godot 3.1
AssetsFreely licensed - see credits below
AudacityFor modifying audio assets from above

Source code:

The game is open source and the can be found on Github.

Credits:

The game uses the following assets.

  • Animal Pack Redux by kenney.nl
  • Free cartoon forest game backgrounds from craftpix.net
  • Fonts from Tappy plane by kenney.nl
  • Gun-shot sound from The Free Firearm Sound Library by Ben Jaszczak, et al.
  • Background music from Carnival Rides by Écrivain

Download & install instructions:

The linux zip package contains the game executables. Extract the package to a directory of your choice and run it from there. Make sure the Animal Hunter.x86_64 file has permissions to execute to be able to run the game.
